item.description:
Finalized plan for Dave And Busters.  Because of scheduling conflicts we won't be able to do dinner their as a big group so I found a nice compromise.  Lets meet at Dave and Busters at 4PM near the front entrance for games and fun until about 6:45 PM.  After that I made a reservation at Legal Seafood which is in the same complex close by for 7PM for dinner.  I had to limit the attendance but there are a few spots left so sign up as soon as possible.

 

Not sure who loves Arcade Games like I do but I'm hoping many of you do! If you are not familiar, Dave & Busters is a great outlet for playing games of all kinds in a very fun enviroment!  They just opened this brand new one in Braintree at the Southshore Mall so it is conveniently located right off the I-93 Freeway with plenty of parking.

 

Boston Couples I hope you will be just as excited as I am to try this out, this place is brand new and State of the Art so it should be a blast!

 

Dave & Busters

250 Granite Street #1908
Braintree, MA 02184
item.name: Fun with Arcade Games at Dave & Busters Southshore Plaza in Braintree
